headline: This Pick-and-Shovel AI Stock Is Up 70% in 2025 and Analysts Say It Has More Gas Left in the Tank
summary: Corning is up 70% already, but with new deals including one with GlobalFoundries, it has more upside to its Street-high price target of $93.

headline: Will Corning (GLW) Beat Estimates Again in Its Next Earnings Report?
summary: Corning (GLW) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.

headline: What Corning (GLW)'s Solid-State Battery Partnership With QuantumScape Means For Shareholders
summary: On September 30, 2025, QuantumScape Corporation and Corning Incorporated announced an agreement to jointly develop and scale high-volume production of ceramic separators for solid-state batteries, combining their materials science and manufacturing strengths for potential commercial applications. This collaboration positions both companies to accelerate the industrialization of next-generation energy storage technology, advancing commercial readiness for emerging battery innovations. We'll...

headline: QuantumScape (QS) Jumps 18.4% on Ceramic Separator Partnership
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Stealing The Spotlight Today. QuantumScape Corp. (NYSE:QS) is one of the top performers on Wednesday. QuantumScape ended two days of losses on Wednesday, surging 18.43 percent to close at $14.59 apiece as investors repositioned portfolios after striking a partnership agreement with Corning Inc. for the development of ceramic separator manufacturing […]

headline: 1 Surging  Stock Worth Investigating and 2 We Brush Off
summary: Great things are happening to the stocks in this article. They’re all outperforming the market over the last month because of positive catalysts such as a new product line, constructive news flow, or even a loyal Reddit fanbase.
